system.availability: Strange Crystalline devices, some of which were owned by the forces one "General Alreen" who fought during the time of the nascent Imperium. As easy to use as a Vox Caster, a message sent from one crystal arrives at every other crystal instantly regardless of range. Allowing for effortless communication at the risk that other unknown individuals also receive them. Whenever a crystal is used, all crystals will briefly broadcast their location in a small burst of static, if able to harness this, other crystals may be locatable after one is found, or others able to find you.
system.cost: A Xenos Artifact of Legend. It cannot be acquired, it must be earned or found.
